This integration empowers advertisers to optimize ad spend and reach high-intent customers more effectively.

title: Renault and Dacia customers warned of cyber attack as personal data stolen
combined_text: Renault and Dacia customers warned of cyber attack as personal data stolen. coventrytelegraph.net.
summary: Renault and Dacia experienced a cyberattack compromising customers' personal data. Approximately 90,000 UK customers were affected by the breach, exposing sensitive information. Data startups must prioritize robust security measures to prevent similar breaches and protect user trust.

title: Your private data isn't as private as you think
description: How law enforcement and private parties can access your information without your knowledge, and what you can do about it.
content: Im not a lawyer, and this piece is for informational purposes only, not legal advice. Laws vary by location and change frequently. If you need specific guidance for your situation, please consult wit… [+5651 chars]
combined_text: Your private data isn't as private as you think. How law enforcement and private parties can access your information without your knowledge, and what you can do about it..
summary: Law enforcement increasingly accesses private data, often without warrants, using third-party brokers. Private entities exploit legal loopholes, like data brokers, to acquire sensitive user information, raising privacy concerns. Individuals can mitigate risks by using privacy-focused tools, opting out of data sharing where possible, and advocating for stronger data protection laws.

combined_text: Announcing the General Availability of SAP Business Data Cloud Connect to Databricks. You can now seamlessly access your most critical SAP data sets in Databricks, and unify it with your enterprise data in the Databricks Intelligence Platform.
summary: SAP BDC Connect enables Databricks users to seamlessly access crucial SAP data for integration. This general availability offers cross-cloud access, unifying SAP data within Databricks' platform. Leverage SAP data with enterprise insights using Databricks' Intelligence Platform, improving data driven decision making.

title: GCC Data Center Switch Market : Driving Connectivity Across the Gulf
combined_text: GCC Data Center Switch Market : Driving Connectivity Across the Gulf. briefingwire.com.
summary: The GCC data center switch market is projected to grow significantly, reaching $520 million by 2028 with a CAGR of 7.3%. Demand for higher bandwidth and low latency networks drives adoption of advanced switching solutions, presenting opportunities. Cloud adoption and digital transformation further boost the necessity for improved data center infrastructure.

title: Purcell : Data privacy might not be what you think
combined_text: Purcell : Data privacy might not be what you think. telegraphherald.com.
summary: Data privacy is often misunderstood, focusing more on security breaches than invisible tracking.  Consumer data collection powers targeted advertising, with platforms profiting immensely from user activity insights.  New regulations and consumer awareness are slowly shifting the landscape, pushing for greater transparency and data control.

title: Renault says united kingdom customer   personal data HAS been stolen in the latest cyber attack to affect a car giant
combined_text: Renault says united kingdom customer   personal data HAS been stolen in the latest cyber attack to affect a car giant. dailymail.co.uk.
summary: Renault confirmed a UK customer data breach, impacting personal information security. The stolen data potentially exposes customers to phishing and identity theft risks. This incident emphasizes the critical need for robust cybersecurity for data-driven startups.
